languages.text: {n}Идира вдруг прыскает со смеху — совсем по старому.{/n} "Ну вы скажете! Да, немного избавления от батюшки-Императора для ведьмы-еретички с заштатного мира... Ну вы скажете".
{n}Idira suddenly snorts just like her old self would.{/n} "Uh-huh. Our fatherly Emperor is sure to spare some deliverance for a heathen witch from some backwater world... That's rich."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира вдруг прыскает со смеху — совсем по старому.{/n} "Ну вы скажете! Да, немного избавления от батюшки-Императора для ведьмы-еретички с заштатного мира... Ну вы скажете".

languages.text: {n}イディラは突然、昔の自分のように鼻を鳴らした。{/n}「ふん。我らが父なる皇帝は、どこかの辺境の世界から来た異教徒の魔女のための救済を惜しまないでしょうね…滑稽だわ」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira suddenly snorts just like her old self would.{/n} "Uh-huh. Our fatherly Emperor is sure to spare some deliverance for a heathen witch from some backwater world... That's rich."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは突然、昔の自分のように鼻を鳴らした。{/n}「ふん。我らが父なる皇帝は、どこかの辺境の世界から来た異教徒の魔女のための救済を惜しまないでしょうね…滑稽だわ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉突然像以前一样哼了一声。{/n}“哼，可不是嘛，咱们像慈父一样的帝皇，肯定会为来自偏远世界的异端女巫带来救赎……呵，简直是离谱到家了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira suddenly snorts just like her old self would.{/n} "Uh-huh. Our fatherly Emperor is sure to spare some deliverance for a heathen witch from some backwater world... That's rich."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉突然像以前一样哼了一声。{/n}“哼，可不是嘛，咱们像慈父一样的帝皇，肯定会为来自偏远世界的异端女巫带来救赎……呵，简直是离谱到家了。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira resopla de repente, como lo haría su antiguo yo.{/n} «Ya, claro. Nuestro buen Emperador, en su piedad, llevará la salvación a una bruja pagana de un mundo alejado de su luz... Muy gracios{mf|o|a}».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira suddenly snorts just like her old self would.{/n} "Uh-huh. Our fatherly Emperor is sure to spare some deliverance for a heathen witch from some backwater world... That's rich."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira resopla de repente, como lo haría su antiguo yo.{/n} «Ya, claro. Nuestro buen Emperador, en su piedad, llevará la salvación a una bruja pagana de un mundo alejado de su luz... Muy gracios{mf|o|a}».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira schnaubt plötzlich, wie ihr altes Ich es tun würde.{/n} "Hm-hmm. Unser väterlicher Imperator hat sicher ein wenig Erlösung für eine heidnische Hexe von irgendeiner abgelegenen, unbedeutenden Welt übrig ... Ganz bestimmt."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira suddenly snorts just like her old self would.{/n} "Uh-huh. Our fatherly Emperor is sure to spare some deliverance for a heathen witch from some backwater world... That's rich."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira schnaubt plötzlich, wie ihr altes Ich es tun würde.{/n} "Hm-hmm. Unser väterlicher Imperator hat sicher ein wenig Erlösung für eine heidnische Hexe von irgendeiner abgelegenen, unbedeutenden Welt übrig ... Ganz bestimmt."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira ricane comme elle le faisait jadis.{/n} « C'est ça, ouais... L'Empereur qui apporterait le salut à une sorcière païenne sortie tout droit du trou du cul de l'univers... Et puis quoi encore ?! »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira suddenly snorts just like her old self would.{/n} "Uh-huh. Our fatherly Emperor is sure to spare some deliverance for a heathen witch from some backwater world... That's rich."

traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira, tıpkı eskiden yaptığı gibi aniden burnundan nefes alarak gülüyor.{/n} "Hı hı. Babacan İmparator'umuz, benim gibi ücra bir dünyanın dinsiz cadısını mı kurtaracakmış? Komik."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira suddenly snorts just like her old self would.{/n} "Uh-huh. Our fatherly Emperor is sure to spare some deliverance for a heathen witch from some backwater world... That's rich."

traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
